desc: Keep your business & family safe from coronavirus. Face masks, disposable gloves, face shields, hand sanitizer & more in stock! 1-3 day delivery. In bulk or small quantity.

layout.text:
• Trustworthy U.S. Company Based in Delaware
• High Quality PPE at Great Prices!
• Free Shipping On All Orders!
• Bulk Orders Available!
• 1-3 Day Expected Delivery Time!
• Discounts Available for Medical, Military,
First Responders, and Government Employees.
